DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled trial . Based inclusion exclusion criterion , 400 eligible volunteer , 20-45 year , 25-hydroxyvitamin D 12.5-50 nmol/L BMI 18.5-28 kg/m2 , enrol randomly assign placebo 2000 IU/d vitamin D3 arm , take placebo one week . The study protocol approve Ethics Committee Huadong Hospital Affiliated Fudan University , Shanghai participant provide write informed consents.In 2-arm RCT aim systematically investigate effect : 1. vitamin D3 supplement serum 25 ( OH ) D level modify factor ; 2. genetic non-genetic variant vitamin D bioavailability ; 3. vitamin D3 supplementation metabolic profile circulate bone-turnover marker
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Intervention Trial Healthy Chinese , Phase II
DOC.detailed_description: At present time , Recommended Dietary Allowance ( RDA ) tolerable upper intake level ( UL ) vitamin D 200 IU/day 800 IU/day Chinese age 11-50 year , respectively . On hand , RDA UL vitamin D age group USA 600IU/day 4000IU/day , respectively . Indeed , recent epidemiological study suggest serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D [ 25 ( OH ) D ] concentration ≥75 nmol/L appear optimal prevent cardiometabolic disease improve bone health . To achieve goal , daily intake 1000 IU equivalent amount source , need , twice much RDA recommend Chinese Nutrition Society . Except individual hypersensitive condition , daily intake less 10,000 IU vitamin D show overt adverse effect base upon study conduct Western population . Since vitamin D metabolic rate relationship health outcome may vary across different ethnical group available data far Caucasians population , remain elucidated whether finding Western population could apply directly Asian people like Chinese . Recently , group conduct first relatively large-scale study Asian evaluate association 25 ( OH ) D risk metabolic syndrome . It find geometric mean plasma 25 ( OH ) D Chinese adult age 50-70 year Beijing Shanghai ( n=3210 ) 40.36 nmol/l percentage vitamin D deficiency [ 25 ( OH ) D < 50 nmol/l ] insufficiency ( 50 ≤ 25 ( OH ) D < 75 nmol/l ) 69.2 % 24.4 % , respectively . Comparing low high 25 ( OH ) D quintile ( ≤28.7 nmol/l vs. ≥57.7 nmol/l ) , odds ratio metabolic syndrome ( MetS ) 1.52 ( 95 % CI 1.17-1.98 , P trend = 0.0002 ) , multiple adjustment . Significant inverse association also exist 25 ( OH ) D MetS component , plus HbA1c . Moreover , low plasma 25 ( OH ) D level find associate increased insulin resistance index ( homeostasis model assessment insulin resistance , HOMA-IR ) overweight obese individual ( BMI ≥24 kg/m2 ) , . ( Lu et al. , Diabetes Care , 2009 ) . According data 2002 China National Nutrition Survey , high prevalence vitamin D deficiency also exit Chinese child age 1-3 year approximate 82 % circulate 25 ( OH ) D ≤ 50nmol/L . In consistent finding , report population-based Korea study show association 25 ( OH ) D insulin resistance modify BMI status ( Choi et al. , The Journal Nutrition,2011 ) . In recent genetic study , find genetic variant GC NADSYN1/DHCR7 significantly associate circulate 25 ( OH ) D level marginal association CYP2R1-rs2060793 25 ( OH ) D level observe Shanghai subpopulation ( Lu et al. , Human Genetics 2011 ) . In addition , develop genetic risk score ( GRS ) evaluate combine effect three SNPs ( rs4588 , rs1790349 rs2060793 ) GC , NADSYN1/DHCR7 CYP2R . Notably , average plasma 25 ( OH ) D concentration individual 5-6 risk allele 11.4 nmol/l low without risk allele . Indeed , previous study suggest intake 100 IU vitamin D could raise circulate 25 ( OH ) D 2.5 nmol/l , implicate 450 IU extra vitamin D require high risk individual . The possible interpretation high prevalence poor vitamin D nutrition among Chinese may due factor : ( 1 ) unlike United States Western country , , , vitamin D enrich fortiﬁed food available China ; ( 2 ) Chinese , particularly woman , like pale skin color , therefore frequently utilize sunscreen umbrella prevent sun exposure . ( 3 ) approximate 318 million people live Heilongjiang , Shaanxi , Jilin , Shanxi , Liaoning , Qinghai , Gansu , Inner Mongolia , Xinjiang , Hebei province , area latitude N37° , previously show prevent skin synthesize sufficient vitamin D winter time . Collectively , factor suggest large proportion Chinese may suffer vitamin D insufficiency deficiency whereas current RDA China might low provide adequate vitamin D people 's health . In order fill gap , therefore , essential study bioavailability follow vitamin D intervention also identify effect genetic variant factor vitamin D metabolism associate health outcome . Ultimately , current study provide important evidence establish optimal vitamin D requirement Chinese people .
DOC.criteria: Age : 2045 year . vitamin D deficiency ( 12.5 ≤ 25 ( OH ) D < 50 nmol/l ) BMI < 18.5 kg/m2 , BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 Total intake calcium diet supplement > 1200mg/d , fast serum calcium level ≥2.75 mmol/l Participating clinical study within previous 3 month Taking vitamin D supplement within previous 3 month Using medication may affect vitamin D metabolism previous 3 month ; Concomitant clinical condition , like liver dysfunction ( serum alanine transaminase ( ALT ) ≥40 U/L ; and/or aspartate transaminase ( AST ) ≥40 U/L ; Glutamyl transpeptidase （GGT）≥50 U/L ; serum creatinine < 50 > 120 µmol/L ; urea nitrogen ( UN ) < 7 > 18 mg/dl , and/or urine acid < 90 > 420 µmol/L ; may affect vitamin D metabolism ; History drug alcohol abuse ( > 40 g/d ) Women pregnancy lactation Individuals mental disorder current use antidepressant , condition may affect understand unwillingness intervention ; Having clinically diagnose AIDS , hepatitis A , hepatitis B , tuberculosis infectious disease .
